ygData.subject: Hey There!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, My names James and I thought I de just say Hi! I ve been playing for around 2 weeks now and have built up a level 8 nearly 9 Shadow Knight.  Great fun all
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

My names James and I thought I'de just say Hi!

I've been playing for around 2 weeks now and have built up a level 8 nearly
9 Shadow Knight. Great fun all round!!!

James(Goraknor the Troll)
